document_name: Issues and challenges of the Energy Sector in Ivory Coast: Emergency Measures and Middle and long terms - synthesis report
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CIV/2012/CIV-2012-01-01-Issues and challenges of the Energy Sector in Ivory Coast: Emergency Measures and Middle and long terms - synthesis report_62d00198bec92ee6390e00980f9152f5.pdf
document_description: The Strategic Development Plan 2011-2030 is a document set out by the government to detail its development vision over the period. Several five-year plans and sectoral documents complete the overall Plan from 2011. The Plan further has extensive annexes detailing sectoral projects. In the case of Conventional Electricity, Renewable and other New Energy, the dedicated annex establishes 66 projects to implement.
